actions.Stomp: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (6d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
